name: Weather Sim
description:
This simulation prototype was made as part of UE's Game Gardening Simulator class by Prof. Stephan Günzel and Prof. Csongor Baranyai.

Game Description

Weather Sim will feature weather types such as sunny, cloudy, and rainy that can be cycled through.

Controls

☁     A & D to move left & right

☁     S for sunny weather

☁    R for rainy weather

Repository Link

Check out Weather Sim's repository.

Credits

Sunaina "Sunny" Miller

☁      itch.io page

☁     Instagram page

University of Europe for Applied Scieneces

This game was created at the Game Design // UE at the University of Europe for Applied Sciences. Supervised by: Prof. Stephan Günzel and Prof. Csongor Baranyai "Game Gardening Simulator"  (SummerSemester 2022)
